The bronegruppa is a temporary grouping of four to five tanks, BMPs or BTRs, or any combination of such vehicles. The BMPs (tracked combat vehicles) or BTRs (wheeled combat vehicles) are deployed without their normally assigned infantry squad on board and fight away from their dismounted troops. The grouping has a significant direct-fire capability and serves as a maneuver reserve

title: Peoples' control was a Communist Party apparatus invention that used quasi-official courts to confront people with their misdeeds, extract public confessions, and shame the perpetrators into better behavior
